policies.name: Property Damage Coverage Verification
policies.description: Guidelines for verifying property damage coverage eligibility.

criteria.condition: Policy active on date of loss
criteria.action: Proceed with claim investigation
criteria.rationale: Coverage must be in force when loss occurred

criteria.action: Apply applicable coverage limits and deductibles
criteria.rationale: Only named perils (or all-risk minus exclusions) are covered

criteria.action: Confirm scheduled location matches claim address
criteria.rationale: Coverage applies to scheduled locations only

modifying_factors.impact: May reduce coverage or exclude certain perils

policies.name: General Liability Claim Assessment
policies.description: Guidelines for assessing general liability claims.

criteria.condition: Bodily injury or property damage alleged
criteria.action: Determine if occurrence happened during policy period
criteria.rationale: Occurrence-based policies require loss during policy term

criteria.action: Evaluate duty to defend and duty to indemnify
criteria.rationale: Coverage responds to legal liability, not moral obligation

criteria.action: Verify incident location covered under policy
criteria.rationale: Most policies have geographic limitations

modifying_factors.impact: Extends coverage to named third parties

policies.name: Workers Compensation Compensability
policies.description: Guidelines for determining workers compensation claim compensability.

criteria.action: Investigate connection between work duties and injury
criteria.rationale: AOE requirement - work must contribute to injury

criteria.condition: Injury occurred in course of employment
criteria.action: Verify injury happened during work time/activities
criteria.rationale: COE requirement - injury during work relationship

criteria.action: Confirm activity was within scope of employment
criteria.rationale: Unauthorized activities may not be compensable

modifying_factors.impact: Apportionment may apply to permanent disability

policies.name: Commercial Auto Liability Coverage
policies.description: Guidelines for commercial auto liability claim coverage.

criteria.condition: Vehicle scheduled on policy or qualifies as covered auto
criteria.action: Verify vehicle coverage symbol applies
criteria.rationale: Coverage symbols determine which vehicles are insured

criteria.action: Confirm permissive use or employee status
criteria.rationale: Policy covers named insured and permitted drivers

criteria.action: Verify vehicle use consistent with policy declarations
criteria.rationale: Use restrictions may limit coverage (business vs personal)

modifying_factors.impact: Covers employee personal vehicles on business

policies.name: Loss Reserve Establishment Guidelines
policies.description: Guidelines for establishing and adjusting claim reserves.

criteria.action: Establish initial reserve within 24-48 hours of assignment
criteria.rationale: Timely reserving ensures accurate financial reporting

criteria.action: Review and adjust reserve within 30 days
criteria.rationale: Reserves must reflect current claim evaluation

criteria.action: Escalate to supervisor/management for approval
criteria.rationale: Authority levels ensure proper oversight

policies.name: Fraud Referral Guidelines
policies.description: Guidelines for identifying and referring suspicious claims.

criteria.action: Refer to Special Investigations Unit (SIU)
criteria.rationale: Pattern of indicators suggests potential fraud

criteria.action: Document findings and consult with SIU and legal
criteria.rationale: Misrep may void coverage or support rescission

criteria.action: Escalate for detailed investigation before payment
criteria.rationale: Staged accidents require professional investigation

policies.name: Subrogation Assessment Guidelines
policies.description: Guidelines for identifying and pursuing subrogation recovery.

criteria.action: Document liable party and preserve evidence
criteria.rationale: Subrogation requires identifiable responsible party

criteria.action: Initiate subrogation demand or litigation
criteria.rationale: Economic analysis determines pursuit viability

criteria.action: Preserve product and notify products liability counsel
criteria.rationale: Product cases require specialized handling

modifying_factors.impact: Insured must be made whole before carrier recovers

policies.name: Claim Settlement Authority
policies.description: Guidelines for claim settlement negotiations and authority.

criteria.action: Negotiate and settle within documented authority limits
criteria.rationale: Authority levels ensure efficient claim resolution

criteria.action: Prepare settlement summary and obtain approval before commitment
criteria.rationale: Large settlements require oversight and approval

criteria.action: Use approved release forms; obtain legal review if modified
criteria.rationale: Proper releases protect against future claims
